extends java.lang.Object

Field Detail

fieldSeparator

public char fieldSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a field and the beginning of the next field (i.e. field delimiter). Default: |

Since:
0.1

componentSeparator

public char componentSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a component and the beginning of the next component (i.e. component delimiter). Default: ^

Since:
0.1

subcomponentSeparator

public char subcomponentSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a subcomponent and the beginning of the next subcomponent (i.e. subcomponent delimiter). Default: &

Since:
0.1

repetitionSeparator

public char repetitionSeparator
Character used to mark the end of a field repetition and the beginning of the next field repetition (i.e. field repetition delimiter). Default: ~

Since:
0.1

escapeCharacter

public char escapeCharacter
Character used to escape characters which would otherwise be interpreted. Default: \

Since:
0.1

fields

protected java.util.ArrayList<HL7Field> fields
List of all fields in this segment.

public java.lang.String getDelimiters()
Returns a string containing all delimiters defined for this message

Returns:
a string containing all delimiters defined for this message: fieldSeparator + componentSeparator + repetitionSeparator + escapeCharacter + subcomponentSeparator

setFields

public void setFields(java.lang.String[] fields,
                      java.lang.String delimiters,
                      boolean escapesInSubcomponents)
Removes all fields from this segment and adds the given fields to it.

Parameters:
fields - array of string representations of fields to be added.
delimiters - a string containing all delimiters defined for this segment: fieldSeparator + componentSeparator + repetitionSeparator + escapeCharacter + subcomponentSeparator
escapesInSubcomponents - whether escape characters are used or not
Since:
0.1
